attributes.action: Keep Turk aka (Truk Truk) in our FIFA 09, Xbox LIve, Team GIMP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand Turkish remains an integral and consistent part of team GIMP and stops being such a martyr.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
